data.title: Christina In The Country – The Ashley's Reality Roundup
data.text:
Josh Hall Reportedly Cut From Upcoming HGTV Show ‘The Flip Off’ Following Split with Wife Christina

9 Comments

Christina Hall is cutting her husband Josh out of her life— and her upcoming show! Josh Hall has reportedly been booted from ‘The Flip Off’– an HGTV show he was set to star on with Christina, Tarek El Moussa and Heather El Moussa next year.

Read More »

Exes Tarek El Moussa & Christina Hall to Star in “Spicy” New HGTV Series ‘The Flip Off’ With Their Current Spouses Heather El Moussa & Josh Hall

3 Comments

Former spouses Tarek El Moussa and Christina Hall, who hosted HGTV’s ‘Flip or Flop for nine years,’ are reuniting on-screen— with their current spouses– for a new series titled ‘The Flip Off.’

Read More »

HGTV Orders New Seasons of “Christina on the Coast” & “Christina in the Country” Starring Christina Hall

No Comments

Christina Hall is going to be renovating a lot more homes, both on the California coastline and the Tennessee countryside. HGTV has ordered new seasons of both her shows, ‘Christina on the Coast’ and ‘Christina in the Country.’

Read More »

Christina Hall’s New Show ‘Christina in the Country’ Set To Air in January 2023; Christina Calls the New Project “A Dream Come True”

5 Comments

HGTV has announced that Christina Hall’s latest show, ‘Christina in the Country’ will premiere next month, showcasing Christina’s life in Tennessee with her husband and kids.

Read More »

Tarek El Moussa & Christina Hall Announce Final, Special Episode of ‘Flip or Flop’ Will Air Next Month: “It’s Time For the Final Flip”

2 Comments

Fans of ‘Flip or Flop’ have one more opportunity to see hosts Tarek El Moussa and Christina Hall work their house-flipping magic while working through awkward tension with one another.

Read More »
